path.style: opacity: 1; stroke-width: 1px; fill: rgb(43, 159, 43); fill-opacity: 0.8; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-opacity: 0.2;

text.style: font-family: 'Lucida Grande', 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 8px; fill: rgb(42, 63, 95); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
font-family: 'Lucida Grande', 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre; opacity: 1;

opacity: 1; font-family: 'Lucida Grande', 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 20px; fill: rgb(42, 63, 95); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
opacity: 0.3; font-family: 'Lucida Grande', 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
